installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Server Files /mnt/server/
apt update && apt install -y curl
apt -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
mkdir -p /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server/ror2 && mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
curl -sqL "https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz" | tar zxvf -
cat << EOF > ror2-update.txt
@ShutdownOnFailedCommand 1 //set to 0 if updating multiple servers at once
@NoPromptForPassword 1
login anonymous
force_install_dir /mnt/server/ror2/
@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows
app_update 1180760
quit%
EOF
./steamcmd.sh +runscript ror2-update.txt
cd /mnt/server/ror2
cat << EOF > "Risk of Rain 2_Data/Config/server.cfg"
//
// Risk of Rain 2 Dedicated Server custom configuration.
//

sv_maxplayers 16; // The maximum number of players.
steam_server_heartbeat_enabled 1; // Set to 0 to not advertise to the master server.
sv_hostname "ROR2 server"; // The name that will appear in the server browser.
sv_port 27015; // The port that the server will bind to. You cannot have multiple server instances with overlapping ports.
steam_server_query_port 27016;
steam_server_steam_port 0;
sv_password ""; // The password someone must provide to join this server. Leave empty if none. This is obviously not encrypted so don't use anything sensitive.

echo "Loaded custom server configuration.";%
EOF

variables.name: SERVER_NAME
